channel.title: Making an rs remake
channel.description:
hello members moparscape i played alot of rsps but a rs remake that something special i want to create it too and i need a team for it what i need forum maker: 0/1 (like a the old rs website) server developer: 1/2 client developer: 0/1 hoster: 0/1 i use this source: http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/295160-crash-patched-blakescape-npc-support.html i hope someone wanna help me if someone wanna apply for something from above send me a pm thank you, ~get_a_life~ apply format
name: age: for what do you want to apply: expirience in that: msn: are you active:

name: Mark
age: 14
for what do you want to apply: to make a forums (but can i make it like vBulletin like mine?)
expirience in that: look at my website http://assualtx.co.cc
msn: mark.enkababyan@hotmail.com
are you active: yeh kinda
[/quote]
^^^Sexy forums maker^^^
check out what he made for me, www.assualtx.co.cc[/quote]

looks like a forum with only a downloaded skin added?

item.title: Making an rs remake
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’m afraid I can’t support this development because all I’ve seen when people have attempted this kind of development is overwhelmed and failed at near time.

Good luck though, but I don’t support.

Read full topic

item.title: Making an rs remake
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Best of luck to you, never works out like you want it to. You’ll get overwhelmed with the amount of work you must do.

Read full topic

item.title: Making an rs remake
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:

Tired of seeing these, good luck. Maybe you won’t quit like everyone else.
[/quote] thanks why are you tired its fun to have a rsps[/quote]That only includes the main page I believe, but it is a simple uploading to your webhost into your public_html folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Making an rs remake

item.description:
@get_a_life1 wrote:

hello members moparscape
i played alot of rsps but a rs remake that something special
i want to create it too
and i need a team for it

what i need

forum maker: 0/1 (like a the old rs website)
server developer: 1/2
client developer: 0/1
hoster: 0/1

i use this source:
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/295160-crash-patched-blakescape-npc-support.html
i hope someone wanna help me

if someone wanna apply for something from above
send me a pm

thank you,
~get_a_life~
